name: Museum AR Map Concept
description:
This is an example of how AR could be implemented into a paper map allowing guests of a museum to know more about an exhibit so they can choose to visit.

The museum map is based off of the Denver Museum of Nature and Science second level however we chose to replace some exhibits with others from around the museum. I am not affiliated with the Denver Museum of Nature and Science in any way and this project is completely unofficial.

How to use:

1. Download the APK file.

2. Install the APK (Allowing unknown sources if applicable)

3. Download either the PDF or the JPG of the map, they are the same.

4. Print out the map or bring it up on another device.

5. Open the app.

Notes:

This was tested on a Samsung Galaxy S10+ so it may have performance issues on phones with lesser power
